answers.answer: Greatly depends on how one developed what's between the ears.

Hi,I will assume that you asked your question the way you did because you are angry or frustrated because either you or someone you know have being diagnosed as diabetec. If this is the case perhaps you have some specific questions you want answered; if this is the case please ask the specific diabetes realated question.There are some very helpful people that participate in this forum. I am sure you could get very useful diabetic related information here.Have a good day,troytroy

title: Stupid?
